response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price. For a limited time, I am willing to sell it to you for $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $800,000 to you at a price that reflects its true value while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
